title: Love & Deception
overview: Elsa knows her time with her special friend is limited, so she wastes none of it, shedding her sexy lingerie once she sees his throbbing, hard member. While watching him play his guitar, Jill can't stop her mind from wondering what this musician's hands will feel like playing her body. His book is no match for Kenna's stellar body and overactive libido. Stolen moments like this one, are the encounters that Scarlett can't get enough of.
